quotes.quote: This is the day that LORD has made, let us rejoice and be glad in it.
Bring the fattened calf and kill it. Let's have a feast and celebrate.
May the Lord make your love increase and overflow for each other and for everyone else, just as ours does for you.
Dear friend, I pray that you may enjoy good health and that all may go well with you, even as your soul is getting along well.
May he grant according to your heart's desire and fulfill all your plans!
Rejoice in the Lord always. I will say it again. Rejoice!
God bless you and keep you, God smile on you and gift you, God look you full in the face and make you prosper.
Give thanks in all circumstances, for this is the will of God in Christ Jesus for you.

God, whom I serve with my whole heart in preaching the gospel of his Son, is my witness how constantly I remember you in my prayers at all times and I pray that now at last by God's will the way may be opened for me to come to you.
Thanks be to God for his inexpressible gift!
On your special day, I pray that God will continue to warm your heart and lift your spirits while granting you peace and serenity on this very special day of yours.
Celebrate life. Celebrate happiness. Celebrate your birthday. Celebrate that God gives all this to you.
God couldn't be everywhere. So he sent a few of his chosen angels on earth. You are one of them. Happy Birthday.
Once a year we celebrate the gift of life that Lord has given us. Happy Birthday to the brightest star in our life.
May God grant strength for every challenge, fulfillment in every adventure and blessings all year long. Happy Birthday.
May Lord bless you abundantly because a sweetheart like you deserves the best! Have a glorious and memorable Birthday!
May the Almighty Bless you with many more birthdays to come. May each birthday be better than the previous one. Happy Birthday to you.
